meta_description: Maryhill Museum of Art presents art collections and exhibitions in a historic setting in the Columbia River Gorge with educational enrichment.
hours_text:
# Visiting Maryhill Museum of Art

Information on hours, ticket prices, accessibility, and planning your museum experience.

**Maryhill Museum of Art ignites a journey of educational enrichment in the Columbia River Gorge by preserving and interpreting art and historic collections.**



## Location

Situated above the Columbia River Gorge in southeastern Washington, the museum and its surrounding landscape provide cultural and environmental context for its collections and programs.

Address: 35 Maryhill Museum Drive  
Goldendale, WA 98620 (on SR-14)

[Directions >>](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Maryhill+Museum+of+Art/@45.6884224,-120.9401344,12z/data=!4m6!3m5!1s0x549627fc553924c9:0xb881dc90af6e15a5!8m2!3d45.6775953!4d-120.864762!16s%2Fm%2F0268fsh?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDQyOC4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D)



## Hours

Maryhill Museum of Art is open to the public seasonally from March 15 – November 15, daily from 10:00 am – 5:00 pm including all U.S. federal holidays.

We are seasonally closed but will reopen on March 15, 2026.



## Tickets

Advance reservations encouraged. Buy now for use starting March 15, 2026!

[Buy Tickets](https://altru118166.sky.blackbaud.com/118166/tickets?tab=3&txobjid=1b87ef14-b89d-4a5c-803f-79124cc2bcd8)



## Membership

#### Tickets

Members contribute to the mission of Maryhill Museum of Art! Whether you plan to visit multiple times in a year or simply wish to make a recurring tax-deductible impact, your membership matters.

## Thank you for a wonderful 85th anniversary season!

## [Visit us at the Archaeology Roadshow](https://www.maryhillmuseum.org/events/archaeology-roadshow-the-dalles)

[See event](https://www.maryhillmuseum.org/events/archaeology-roadshow-the-dalles)

## [Inspire Maryhill Memories](/join-and-give/donate)

[Make a gift to support the museum](/join-and-give/donate)

## [Ignite a journey of enrichment](/join-and-give/membership)

[Become a Member](/join-and-give/membership)

Maryhill Museum of Art ignites a journey of educational enrichment in the Columbia River Gorge by preserving and interpreting art and historic collections.

Situated on a bluff above the eastern Columbia River Gorge in south-central Washington, the museum’s architecture, views, and collections embody both cultural and natural significance.

## Upcoming Exhibitions
